origin: Making games in #place# could be pretty inspiring#end# !
Inspiration: your personal refuge to retreat to
a little moment you think was wonderful
something you'd like the world to know
one of your favorite adventures you had
your biggest dream for the future
Inspiration2: sleeping in a bed of moss
listening to the sound of the rain 🌧
feeling the rain on your face 🌧
Why: Show people your personal view of the world
Games don't have to be about saving the world
Tell people a story they never heard before
Feel free to forget about design rules for your game
Don't plan too much, just create
You don’t have to be part of videogame culture to make and LOVE videogames
P.S.: Your worth is not tied to your work
Think about how your other creative activities could inform your game
Put on a good song & just start creating
Feel free to keep it raw & sketchy
Feel free to do some field research
whyfieldresearch: Go build the most beautiful place in the world
